text:
Mitzi Hoag (born Margaret Hoag; September 25, 1932 – February 26, 2019) was an American actress. She appeared in more than 73 different TV shows and movies. Her best known roles are in "We'll Get By", "Bonanza", "Here Come the Brides", "The Facts of Life" and "The Partridge Family".
Hoag died on February 26, 2019 in Sherman Oaks, California, aged 86.
